text: Listen Up! was a 2004 CBS television series. It was a sitcom starring Jason Alexander as Tony Kleinman, a sportscaster from the fictional "Listen Up!" His cohost is named Bernie, and is a hall of famer. Jason has a wife, Dana, and two kids, one named Mickey. Mickey is very good at golf, but gets low grades. The series only lasted for one season, 22 episodes. Category:American sitcoms Category:2004 television series debuts Category:CBS network shows Category:English-language television programs
title: Listen Up
